li.label: Enable Emergency Tending
li.tooltip: A worktype about tending emergency wounds. Allows colonists to react to emergencies better.

li.label: Enable Nursery
li.tooltip: A worktype about providing basic care to recovering colonists. Allows social pawns to care for the sick and wounded instead of medical ones.

li.label: Enable Veterinary
li.tooltip: A worktype about providing medical care to animals. Allows better individuality and to react to sick or wounded animals.

li.label: Enable Taming
li.tooltip: A worktype about taming wild animals. Much riskier than other handling jobs.

li.label: Enable Butchering
li.tooltip: A worktype about butchering animals for meat and leather. Allows colonist to react to low meat in storage.

li.label: Enable Brewing
li.tooltip: A worktype about brewing beer and other alcoholic beverages. Allows colonist to react to fermenting related events and low alcohol stock.

li.label: Enable Drilling
li.tooltip: A worktype about drilling for resources deep underground. Is set at a lower natural priority to not consume every waking moment of miner colonists.

li.label: Enable Pruning
li.tooltip: A worktype about pruning gauranlen trees.

li.label: Enable Drug Production
li.tooltip: A worktype about producing drugs and medicine. Allows intellectual skill to affect its priority.

li.label: Enable Refueling
li.tooltip: A worktype about refueling campfires and other fuel-consuming devices. Is set at a much higher natural priority than normal hauling jobs.

li.label: Enable Deathcare
li.tooltip: A worktype about disposing of the dead. Allows colonists that don't mind corpses to prioritize this job. Also allows colonist to react to death in their yard.

li.label: Enable Entity Handling
li.tooltip: A worktype about anomaly entities. Allows for proper usage of the intellectual skill when supressing. Requires Anomaly.
